trans-unit.resname: P30M·1★ | Richard Garfield, Ph.D. | Card Name
P30M·1★ | Richard Garfield, Ph.D. | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)
trans-unit.target: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)

trans-unit.resname: P30M·1★ | Richard Garfield, Ph.D. | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: And yea he doth spake: "Let there be Magic."
trans-unit.target: And yea he doth spake: "Let there be Magic."

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

trans-unit.source: Three decades since blooming, it remains a thing of beauty.
trans-unit.target: Three decades since blooming, it remains a thing of beauty.
